snippet: The private school’s board announced a plan for training and prevention programs in reaction to accusations of past sexual abuse of students by faculty members.
abstract: Horace Mann School announces a series of steps to address reports of past sexual abuse at the elite private institution in the Bronx; school officials will work with the New York Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Children to review procedures, train faculty and staff members and develop prevention programs for students; officials also pledge that all employees will undergo extensive background checks.
lead_paragraph: The private school’s board announced a plan for training and prevention programs in reaction to accusations of past sexual abuse of students by faculty members.

headline.seo: Horace Mann School Details Steps to Handle Sexual Abuse Reports
headline.main: Horace Mann Details Steps to Address Sexual Abuse Cases
headline.print_headline: Elite School Details Steps To Address Abuse Cases
